price: Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn, (yεsrε Wo sε): Yi yεn fri (Amanehunu gya yi ) mu, na sε yεsan kͻ (yε bͻne) bio a, nokorε sε na yεyε abͻneεfoͻ ampa.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rabbanā akhrij'nā min'hā fa-in ʿud'nā fa-innā ẓālimūna
